Article Title: Taylor Swift avoids "publicly supporting" Blake Lively and fans have figured out the reason behind it
Article Text:
Image via Getty

Taylor Swift Has “Distanced” Herself From Blake Lively Because Of This Reason, Fans Say



Blake Lively Was Not Spotted With Taylor Swift At Super Bowl 2025



Taylor Swift, the billionaire pop star, has been in the news since she got booed at the Super Bowl last weekend when Travis Kelce’s team, the Kansas City Chiefs lost the trophy to the Philadelphia Eagles. Away from the Super Bowl drama, the pop star has also found herself involved in the legal drama between Blake Lively and Justin Baldoni. But now, the reason why Taylor Swift has “distanced” herself from Blake Lively is pretty clear, according to fans.Taylor Swift has remained pretty silent about the whole controversial situation and is yet to make an official announcement about it. It seems like fans have found the reason behind it.A fan took to X and wrote, “The fact that Taylor Swift, huge advocate of the womens movement, didnt support bestie Blake Lively speaks volumes. If anyone would support, know and have proof that Blake was harrassed it would be Taylor Swift. Talks, calls, texts...Yet Taylor didn't support it. Hmmm”Another fan wrote, “If my bestfriend who made me godmother to her children was in a legal battle over sexual harassment & retaliation, I would be standing ten toes down with her. I would not abandon her. The fact that Taylor Swift distanced herself from Blake Lively is damning enough.”While it is not confirmed why Taylor Swift has not been spotted recently with her best friend, Blake Lively, fans are pretty convinced that this is the reason behind it.For the unversed, Blake Lively had accused Justin Baldoni of harassment and Justin filed a counter lawsuit against Blake Lively and her husband Ryan Reynolds accusing them of defamation and trying to take over control of their blockbuster movie, It Ends With Us. Taylor Swift was named by Justin Baldoni in the lawsuit as he felt Blake Lively tried to “use” Taylor Swift’s power and influence to gain control of the movie.Many fans also expected to see Taylor Swift and Blake Lively at the Super Bowl held last weekend but Blake was nowhere to be found at the stadium. This was in complete contrast to the 2024 Super Bowl when Blake Lively was spotted cheering on Travis Kelce as she stood next to Taylor Swift. The two were also spotted hugging each other when the Kansas City Chiefs won the trophy last year.A few days ago, a source revealed to Page Six that “Taylor really wishes Blake hadn’t dragged her into this whole situation.” This might be true considering how Taylor Swift has avoided being spotted with Blake Lively.With the Chiefs losing the Super Bowl, both Travis Kelce and Taylor Swift have been trolled but have remained silent. They have also not been spotted out in public since then.Also Read: Hailee Steinfeld reacts as Josh Allen gets asked out on a date during their appearance at NFL Honors
Article Summary: Taylor swift has been in the news since she got booed at the super bowl. The pop star has also found herself involved in the legal drama between blake lively and justin baldoni. Taylor swift has remained silent about the whole controversial situation and is yet to make an official announcement.

Article Title: Triple H and Stephanie McMahon Age Difference: Personal Life Details About the WWE Heads
Article Text:
(Image Via Getty)

Power Couple: Exploring the Personal and Professional Lives of Triple H and Stephanie McMahon



Great Triple H & Stephanie McMahon moments: WWE Top 10, Nov. 29, 2020

Opie and Anthony,

Backstage of WWE: Discovering the Age Difference and Relationship Secrets of Triple H and Stephanie McMahon



“Before anything happened romantically between us, we spoke to Vince about the situation, and he told us it was okay with him. Soon after that, though, he changed his mind. He said he gave it more thought and realized, ‘This won’t work out. You two cannot do this. ‘He took it away just like that”

Behind the scenes of WWE , one power couple has made a lasting impact for over two decades—Triple H (Paul Levesque) and Stephanie McMahon. Known as one of the most influential duos in wrestling history, Triple H is a 14-time World Champion, while Stephanie McMahon plays a crucial role in WWE. Let’s dive into their relationship and the age difference between these two iconic figures.Triple H and Stephanie McMahon initiated their love story in 2000, which is actually a scripted on-screen romance between them and then it turned into a true romance. Both couples are engaged on Valentine's Day and then marry each other in the same year 2003.In an interview withTriple H asserted that he started dating Stephanie McMahon after being separated from his ex-girlfriend Joan Marie Laurer. Additionally, Laurer asserted that their relationship began when she and Triple H were still together. The couple gave birth to three daughters named Aurora Rose, Murphy Claire, and Vaughn Evelyn.Triple H is 14 times World Champion, two times Royal Rumble winner, and three-times Slammy Award winner. Stephanie McMahon is a former WWE Women’s Champion and two-time Slammy Award winner.Triple H (Paul Levesque) is currently 55 years old as he was born in 1969. Stephanie McMahon is currently 48 years old as she was born in 1976. As we look at their age difference, Triple H is close to 7 years and 2 months older than Stephanie McMahon.Initially, Triple H and Stephanie McMahon kept their relationship a secret for some time as Vince McMahon hesitated a bit. Triple H has to ask about Stephanie’s acceptance of their togetherness.Triple H wrote about this incident in his book “Making The Game: Triple H’s Approach to a Better Body:Ultimately when Vince McMahon agreed to their relationship, they both married in 2003 and till then made a strong bond along with each other and gave major couple goals to all their supporting fans.Also Read: Triple H And Stephanie McMahon: A Love Story That Goes Beyond The Ring
Article Summary: Triple h (paul levesque) and stephanie mcmahon are one of the most influential duos in wrestling history. Triple h is a 14-time world champion, while stephanie mcmahon plays a crucial role in wwe. The couple gave birth to three daughters named aurora rose, murphy claire, and vaughn evelyn.

Article Title: Champions Trophy 2025: Pakistan vs New Zealand Live Streaming, Dream11 Prediction, Venue, Date & Time Details
Article Text:
Pakistan vs New Zealand (AP/PTI Photo)

Pakistan vs New Zealand – Opening Match Details

Date: Wednesday, February 19, 2025

Venue: National Stadium, Karachi

Match Start Time: 2:30 PM IST

Toss Time: 2:00 PM IST

Where to Watch Live?

TV Broadcast: Star Sports and Network 18 channels (LIVE from 2:00 PM IST)

Live Streaming: JioHotstar app and website (LIVE from 2:00 PM IST)

Live Updates: Follow real-time coverage, ball-by-ball updates, and expert opinions on TimesofIndia.com

Squads

Pakistan:

New Zealand:

The tournament consists of two groups:

Group A: India, Pakistan, New Zealand, Bangladesh

Group B: Australia, South Africa, England, Afghanistan

Pakistan is set to host its first major cricket tournament in nearly three decades as the ICC Champions Trophy 2025 kicks off on February 19. This landmark event marks a significant moment for Pakistan, a country that was previously off-limits for ICC events due to security concerns.With matches being held in Karachi, Lahore, and Rawalpindi, the tournament aims to reaffirm Pakistan's position as a premier cricketing destination.The ninth edition of the Champions Trophy will feature eight of the best ODI teams competing for the title. Defending champions Pakistan will play host, while India’s matches will be played in Dubai due to the hybrid model agreed upon by the ICC.Hosts and defending champions Pakistan face New Zealand in the opening match of the tournament on Wednesday. New Zealand are favourites going into the game after beating Pakistan in the tri-nation final at the same venue recently.Mohammad Rizwan (c), Babar Azam, Fakhar Zaman, Kamran Ghulam, Saud Shakeel, Tayyab Tahir, Faheem Ashraf, Khushdil Shah, Salman Ali Agha, Usman Khan, Abrar Ahmed, Haris Rauf, Mohammad Hasnain, Naseem Shah, Shaheen Shah Afridi.Mitchell Santner (c), Michael Bracewell, Mark Chapman, Devon Conway, Lockie Ferguson, Matt Henry, Tom Latham, Daryl Mitchell, Will O’Rourke, Glenn Phillips, Rachin Ravindra, Nathan Smith, Kane Williamson, Will Young, Jacob Duffy.With the tournament returning after an eight-year hiatus, all eyes will be on Pakistan as they aim to successfully host the event and put up a strong title defense. Cricket fans can expect an electrifying start as Pakistan faces New Zealand in the highly anticipated opener.
Article Summary: The icc champions trophy 2025 kicks off on february 19. Defending champions pakistan face new zealand in the opening match. The tournament will be held in karachi, lahore, and rawalpindi. India's matches will be played in dubai due to hybrid model agreed upon by the icc.

Article Title: ‘If that gets him back’: Dana White Seemingly Nods Conor McGregor’s Potential Match In BKFC
Article Text:
Conor McGregor Eyeing A BKFC Championship; Where Does That Leave UFC & Dana White?

Last year, UFC president Dana White said if Conor McGregor fights again for a promotion it "will be sometime next year". Late last year, the Irish UFC star was ordered to pay Nikita Hand almost 250,000 euros in damages and her legal costs. After he was found liable for assault in a civil r**e case. And now that McGregor has declared his intentions to be a bare-knuckle fighting champion, White has seemingly okayed McGregor’s possible return to the ring once again.McGregor who’s also known as The Notorious One made waves recently when he shared his intentions of stepping into the BKFC ring. "If you think I'm here giving these speeches and leading these men into battle and that I'm not going to step in myself, think again. Without a doubt. Conor McGregor will fight in the Bare Knuckle Fighting Championship, mark my words. I would do it for free," Conor said at a recent press conference when asked about the BKFC event scheduled to be held in April.However, McGregor is under contract with the UFC and reportedly has two fights remaining on his contract. So, fans were naturally curious to find out whether he would return to the UFC ring before his BKFC conquests.David Feldman, president of BKFC, reportedly met with White to get his approval to feature McGregor in the BKFC fight. There is something at stake. I think the UFC will probably be willing to collaborate in that regard because they collaborate with Bare Knuckle. And Conor is an owner, a minority owner, so there might be something there if that gets Conor back in the ring," UFC star Brendan Schaub, in his podcast, The Schaub Show.McGregor also known as ‘Notorious’, has been a staple in the UFC for over a decade and chances are, his much-anticipated stint in bare-knuckle boxing will up his value, and lead his UFC investors to a profit in the near future.There’s quite a bit of speculation surrounding his BKFC debut and fans are now anticipating the possibility of seeing McGregor face off against Eddie Alvarez or a rematch with rival Nate Diaz in the bare-knuckle arena.
Article Summary: Conor mcgregor has declared his intentions to be a bare-knuckle fighting champion. Last year, ufc president dana white said if conor mcgregor fights again for a promotion it "will be sometime next year" the irish ufc star was ordered to pay nikita hand almost 250,000 euros in damages and her legal costs.

Article Title: NBA Offseason Rumors: Los Angeles Lakers might pursue $108 million New York Knicks star to support LeBron James and Luka Doncic in Championship run
Article Text:
Tired of too many ads? go ad free now

Theare riding high in mid-February, having won 10 of their last 12 games. With Luka Doncic firmly established as the team’s cornerstone, the franchise is in a strong position to contend for championships in the coming years. While the focus remains on the current season, speculation about potential offseason moves is already heating up. One name that has emerged as a possible target for the Lakers is former New York Knicks starAccording to Jake Fischer of The Stein Line, Barrett’s future with the Toronto Raptors is uncertain.Fischer wrote.Fischer also noted that the Raptors’ focus on developing young talents like Gradey Dick and Ja’Kobe Walter could make RJ Barrett a trade candidate this summer.

LeBron James and Luka Doncic (Image via Emil T. Lippe/ AP)

Tired of too many ads? go ad free now

Barrett, who was drafted third overall by the Knicks in 2019, spent four-and-a-half seasons in New York before being traded to Toronto in January 2024. While he was a reliable secondary scorer for the Knicks, his inconsistent three-point shooting and underwhelming playoff performances led to his departure. Since joining the Raptors, Barrett has shown flashes of improvement, averaging 21.8 points per game on 55.3% shooting from the field and 39.2% from beyond the arc in 32 games last season.This season, RJ Barrett’s shooting efficiency has dipped slightly, but he’s started February strong, posting 23.5 points per game while shooting 51.3% from the field and 36.4% from three-point range. If he can sustain this level of play, Barrett could become an attractive option for teams like the Los Angeles Lakers , who are in need of reliable perimeter scoring to complement Doncic.Pairing RJ Barrett with Luka Doncic would create a dynamic offensive duo. Doncic’s ability to draw defenders and kick the ball out to a capable shooter like Barrett could elevate the Lakers’ offense to new heights. However, any potential deal would depend on the Raptors’ willingness to part ways with RJ Barrett and the Los Angeles Lakers’ ability to make the finances work.Also read: NBA Offseason Rumors: Los Angeles Lakers in potential pursuit of $8 million Golden State Warriors center to support the Luka-LeBron deadly duo As the offseason approaches, all eyes will be on Barrett and whether the Los Angeles Lakers can pull off a move to bring him to Los Angeles. For now, fans can only speculate, but the possibility of a Barrett-Doncic partnership is certainly intriguing.
Article Summary: The toronto raptors are riding high in mid-february, having won 10 of their last 12 games. With luka doncic firmly established as the team’s cornerstone, the franchise is in a strong position to contend for championships in the coming years. One name that has emerged as a possible target for the lakers is former new york knicks star rj barrett.

Article Title: LeBron James vs Michael Jordan: Ex-Chicago Bulls star exposes who NBA execs think is the real GOAT
Article Text:
LeBron James and Michael Jordan. Image via: Kevin Mazur/Getty Images

vs.

GOAT

Kendall Gill shared NBA execs’ verdict on the GOAT debate



LeBron James and Michael Jordan. Image via: Charles Krupa/ AP

The debate on LeBron James Michael Jordan , the greatest of all time debate is far from settling as it comes up with new perspectives. While James still has, at least a few years on his sleeves and he has been on a streak of adding more records to his already stunning basketball resume, Jordan’s impact in the basketball narrative has always been on top alongside James. Now, in a recent interview, former Chicago Bulls star Kendall Gill shared that NBA executives already have theirpick in the debate.NBA has never openly shared its pick on the LeBron James vs. Michael Jordan GOAT debate. While it has been a safe play for the league to maintain the balance among fans, former NBA star Kendall Gill seemingly has the answer to the long-time debated question as he shared that he got it from NBA executives at the United Center. In a recent chat with the 2 Raw 4 TV podcast, the former NBA star gave the inside scoop on the matter.“I’m at the United Center all the time. And I did this specifically to get answers from executives of other teams. I go downstairs and ask each executive: ‘In their prime, who would you take in the draft—Michael Jordan or LeBron James?’ Just one executive chose LeBron over Jordan. That tells you everything,” Gill said.That tells you everything? Of course, most have been long-time devout fans of Jordan but James has also made his case strong. Additionally, it is also hard to compare the legends following their statistics.James is on top in regards to both their career points holding a stunning 41,641 points and continuing while Jordan posted 32,292 points in his legendary career. James has 21 All-Star selections to his credit while Jordan ended his career with 14. James has never won the Defensive Player of the Year award in his career. In the 1987–88 season, Jordan won the NBA Defensive Player of the Year award, becoming the first player to claim both the scoring title and DPOY in the same year. Jordan has 10 NBA scoring titles, which is the most in NBA history while James has claimed only one. Michael Jordan won the MVP award five times and James is a four-time NBA MVP.Also Read: “Go f**k it, go”: LeBron James explains what his wife Savannah James endured to influence his basketball legacy The stats continue and both the legends have made their marks in the league in different ways. Regardless, James’ reign as a dominant NBA star is not over as he recently surpassed the record set by his idol, Michael Jordan, the only other NBA player to score 40 after turning 40.
Article Summary: Kendall gill shared nba execs’ verdict on the goat debate. Just one executive chose lebron james over michael jordan, gill said. James is on top in regards to both their career points holding a stunning 41,641 points and continuing while jordan posted 32,292 points in his legendary career.

Article Title: Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce are set to make their social debut, with the couple potentially walking a red carpet soon
Article Text:
Image via Getty Images

Travis Kelce and Taylor Swift might make their red carpet debut at the Met Gala

Travis Kelce and Taylor Swift, who have been dating since summer 2023, may be making their red carpet debut this year. They could have attended major red carpet events like Swift's Eras Tour film premiere in Los Angeles in October 2023 and the Grammys and VMAs in 2023 and 2024, but decided against them due to scheduling or unknown reasons. With Swift's Eras Tour over and Kelce having a break before the next football season, this event might be the perfect opportunity for them to make their red carpet debut.Travis Kelce and Taylor Swift have been busy with social engagements and busy schedules since dating in 2023. Taylor's Eras Tour and Travis' role in helping the Kansas City Chiefs win three consecutive Super Bowls make them as busy as any celebrity couple.Both Swift and Kelce, who are off the road after a disappointing Super Bowl loss, are expected to attend the Met Gala red carpet on May 5. People Magazine reports that they will make headlines due to their fashion expertise and previous attendance at the event. Both Swift and Kelce are expected to make a statement at the event.“As part of their R&R time, it's thought the couple could finally make an official red carpet appearance together — with the Met Gala earmarked as their first potential event together,” the Mirror reported of Kelce and Swift. “So far Swift and Kelce, who began dating in 2023, have struggled to align their schedules to step out together at an event.”Swift and her boyfriend Kelce have decided to attend the Met Gala, a first for Swift, as she hasn't attended the event with any of her boyfriends since 2016. This follows their 2023 invitation to the Oscars, where they also declined. “… However the Met Gala isn't until May, and with Swift not planning to tour this year it's thought she and Kelce could turn out at the red carpet event together. The event would be a ‘relationship first' for the pair as they anticipated to step out together.”Also Read: “Negotiate with terrorists”: Saturday Night Live producer branded Travis Kelce's girlfriend Taylor Swift a terrorist Taylor Swift has been supporting Kansas City Chief and Travis Kelce after the Super Bowl 59 loss, but was unable to cheer on Kelce. Now, they plan to take time to enjoy each other. Swift is rumored to work on new music this year, possibly a new album, and is discussing a smaller-scale tour in 2026, similar to the Eras Tour.
Article Summary: Travis kelce and taylor swift may make their red carpet debut at the met gala. The couple have been dating since summer 2023. They could have attended major red carpet events like swift's eras tour film premiere in los angeles in october 2023, but decided against them due to scheduling or unknown reasons.

Article Title: “It was my idea”: Mets owner Steve Cohen calls out Scott Boras for minimal contributions in Pete Alonso’s re-signing
Article Text:
Steve Cohen calls out Scott Boras for minimal contributions in Pete Alonso’s re-signing (Image Source: Alonso/IG, NYTimes)

Steve Cohen bashed Steve Cohen for minimal participation in Pete Alonso’s contract negotiations

“It was my idea. I just felt that the negotiation had gone on so long, I just wanted to make sure that he heard from us how we felt about him. I just felt like he deserved that respect. He's been a great Met for a long time, he's a fan favorite, and I thought there was a real opportunity to sit down with him and kind of hash it out,”

Steve Cohen on Juan Soto, Francisco Lindor & a High-Stakes Meeting That Kept Pete Alonso in New York

“And so David and I flew down to Tampa, had a great conversation over a few hours, and frankly Pete did all the talking. Scott Boras was there and Scott didn’t say a freaking word the whole time. And it was like I turned to him, I go, 'I just want to make sure... you're still breathing over there!'”

"I love it. That means you're onto something, you're doing something well. Last year, we might've been a little bit of an underdog. Now all of the sudden, people are noticing, 'Hey, this is a good team.' And that's the way I want it. We want to come into every season with high expectations.”

Pete Alonso’s re-signing with the New York Mets has been one of the hot topics of the offseason. The reason behind the huge buzz around his hiring is contributed by the fact that Mets owner Steve Cohen publicly revealed the conclusions of his contract negotiations. Talking about re-signing, Cohen recently bashed Alonso's agent Scott Boras for his minimal contributions in the $54 Million signing.Earlier this month, the New York Mets announced re-signing their star first baseman Pete Alonso for a whopping $54 Million contract. Shortly after the signing, reports emerged, claiming that Alonso had an in-person meeting with Mets owner Steve Cohen.Apart from Steve Cohen, the meeting also featured Pete Alonso’s agent Scott Boras. On Monday Cohen made an appearance on the “Meet at the Apple” podcast by the New York Mets, to talk about Alonso’s $54 Million re-signing, during one of the segments of the podcast, Cohen bashed Boras for his minimal inputs during contract negotiations meeting with Alonso.Cohen said.Cohen further added.Whether it’s Pete Alonso’s re-signing or Juan Soto’s massive signing, the New York Mets have succeeded in making a great lineup for the 2025 MLB season. Moving forward in the podcast episode, Steve Cohen praised his team and said:Before his recent statement, Steve Cohen made headlines last week when he revealed “humanizing the negotiations” with Pete Alonso.
Article Summary: Pete alonso’s re-signing with the new york mets has been one of the hot topics of the offseason. The reason behind the huge buzz around his hiring is contributed by the fact that mets owner steve cohen publicly revealed the conclusions of his contract negotiations.

Article Title: Joe Burrow spotted with a woman who was previously seen with CeeDee Lamb sparking bizarre speculation among fans
Article Text:
Image via Cooper Neill/Getty

Joe Burrow Was Recently Spotted With A Woman Who Was Also Spotted With Ceedee Lamb And Fans Have Questions About It



Joe Burrow Has Kept His Dating Life Pretty Private After He Broke Up With His Ex Girlfriend



Joe Burrow , the quarterback of the Cincinnati Bengals , has a huge fan base among women and many are curious about his personal life, which he mostly likes to keep private. Recently, a picture of him with a woman has gone viral, raising eyebrows. While fans are curious about the woman, but now there is a bizarre speculation going on and it includes CeeDee lambs.Recently, a picture of Joe Burrow has gone viral with Thursday Night Football’s feature reporter Taylor Rooks. The picture is undated and shows the two laughing as they sat next to each other at a high end restaurant. While fans are curious about the nature of their relationship, there is a bizarre speculation going around that Taylor Rooks was “previously with” Ceedee Lambs.A fan took to X and wrote, “Wasn’t she just with CeeDee Lamb?”, while another fan wrote, “Wasnt she just with CeeDee lamb last week??”A third fan wrote, “CeeDee punching air rn”. The reason for this speculation is, just a day before the Super Bowl, Taylor Rooks was spotted with Ceedee Lambs at a party in New Orleans.In the pictures that have gone viral, Ceedee Lamb is dressed in a white graphic T-shirt as he wrapped his arm around Taylor Rooks. Taylor Rooks looked stunning as she wore a black strapless dress and big golden hoops. She kept her short hair open and opted for minimal makeup to complete her look for the night.When the picture of Taylor Rooks with Ceedee Lamb had gone viral, fans were losing their minds over how beautiful they looked together. A fan wrote, “Now that is a beautiful couple!”, while another fan wrote, “If this his gf lamb is winning she’s beautiful let’s go Lamb!”Currently, there is no confirmation if Taylor Rooks is dating either of the NFL players or is just friends with both of them but fans have made up their own stories.As for Joe Burrow, he remains officially single as he has not confirmed any relationship rumours after his relationship with ex girlfriend Olivia Holzmacher ended in 2023. Olivia Holzmacher and Joe Burrow met in college back in 2017 and remained together for a couple of years.She was also spotted cheering on for Joe Burrow many times and there were also rumours about an engagement. As luck would have it, things did not work out between the two and they broke up.Later, Joe Burrow was rumoured to be dating famous Olivia Ponton but the two have not confirmed their relationship yet.Also Read: Taylor Swift has "fresh evidence" against her in Blake Lively and Justin Baldoni drama that is raising new questions
Article Summary: Cincinnati bengals quarterback joe burrow was recently spotted with a woman. The woman is taylor rooks, the feature reporter for thursday night football. A day before the super bowl, rooks was spotted with ceedee lambs. Fans are speculating that rooks is dating either of them.

Article Title: WWE RAW Results & Highlights (2/17/25): The 2025 Elimination Chamber Matches are Set in Stone and More
Article Text:
Image via WWE

Opening segment with Sami Zayn

AJ Styles vs. Dominik Mysterio



Ivy Nile vs. Dakota Kai

Segment with Gunther and Jey Uso

Penta vs. Pete Dunne

Raquel Rodriguez vs. Roxanne Perez

Seth Rollins vs. Finn Bálor

WWE RAW this week saw the last few slots for the Elimination Chamber being filled, along with other exciting matches and heated moments taking place.The February 17th, 2025, edition of Monday Night RAW was presented from the Spectrum Center in Charlotte, North Carolina. The show continued the road to the WWE Elimination Chamber with more qualifying matches and explosive in-ring action by superstars.Sami Zayn returns to RAW after being taken out with a Piledriver assault by Kevin Owens. He accepted Kevin Owens' challenge for the Elimination Chamber, but RAW GM Adam Pearce refused to make the match, considering Sami is still not cleared. But Zayn insists on Pearce and claims that he is not afraid of the repercussions. Following a huge verbal back and forth, in the end, Adam Pearce makes the match, but an Unsanctioned match.The match was made last week after AJ Styles returned to RAW and had an altercation with Dominik Mysterio and Carlito. The action went back and forth as Dominik displayed an exceptional performance against The Phenomenal One. But in the end, it was not enough to put him down. Despite Carlito interfering, Styles takes him out and counters Dominik with a Styles Clash to win. After the bout, Bron Breakker tries to spear Styles, but he moves out, and Dominik Mysterio gets taken down, leading to AJ taking him out with a Pele Kick.This contest was a WWE Women’s Intercontinental Championship No.1 Contender’s Match. Dakota Kai and Ivy Nile fought with everything they had as a huge opportunity hung in the balance. In the final moments of the bout, Dakota Kai delivers a springboard stomp to the back of Ivy Nile's head. She then lifts her and hits a Go To Kick to pick up the win. As she celebrates, the champion Lyra Valkyria enters the ring to pose with her title.The World Heavyweight Champion Gunther mocks Jey Uso by entering him through the crowd. He even threatens Michael Cole and Pat McAfee for running his mouth each week and being a huge YEET movement fan. As Gunther continues to insult Jey and claim that he will end his WrestleMania dreams, the YEET man storms to the ring, breaking through the officials, and a brawl ensues between them. The officials rush to the ring to separate the duo as the segment comes to an end.Pete Dunne looked to gain momentum at the expense of RAW's newest rising star, Penta. The match was a stellar bout pitting two different styles against each other with captivating in-ring action. Towards the end of the bout, Ludwig Kaiser interferes but gets into a verbal altercation with Pete Dunne. Penta sends Pete crashing into Kaiser and hits the Penta Driver to seal the victory.This was the last Women’s Elimination Chamber Qualifying Match. The upstart Roxanne Perez went up against the dominant Raquel Rodriquez in this high-stakes bout. The match was a stellar showdown and a thrilling experience to witness. Towards the end, Bianca Belair makes her way to confront Liv Morgan. She tries to run but is stopped by Naomi. This distraction costs Raquel as Roxanne hits the Pop Rox to get the three count and pick up the win.The main event was the Men’s Elimination Chamber Qualifying Match, pitting longtime rivals Seth Rollins against Finn Balor. This was their 11th one-on-one match in WWE, and much like their previous encounters, Balor and Rollins put up yet another captivating showdown. The excellent display of in-ring prowess of both competitors, multiple counters, and near falls made it a must-see bout and led to the fans erupting in a 'This is Awesome' chant. In the end, Balor connected with a Coupe De Grace and locked in a cross face. But Rollins escaped the hold and quickly countered with a Stomp to win and get the last spot in the Elimination Chamber match.Also read: Two New Matches Teased for WWE Elimination Chamber 2025 on SmackDown
Article Summary: The february 17th, 2025, edition of monday night raw was presented from the spectrum center in charlotte, north carolina. The show continued the road to the wwe elimination chamber with more qualifying matches and explosive in-ring action. Sami zayn returns to raw after being taken out with a piledriver assault by kevin owens.

Article Title: Double Olympic medallist Manu Bhaker breaks silence on coach Jaspal Rana's future
Article Text:
Manu Bhaker (PTI Photo)

NEW DELHI: Double Olympic medallist shooter Manu Bhaker has clarified that Jaspal Rana will continue to be her coach despite his recent appointment as the High Performance trainer for the pistol discipline by the National Rifle Association of India (NRAI).Rana, a four-time Asian Games gold medallist, had a fallout with Manu before the Tokyo Olympics , but they reconciled before the 2024 Paris Games , where Manu made history by winning two bronze medals.Under Rana's guidance, Manu, who had been struggling after the Tokyo Games, made a remarkable comeback and became the first Indian to win two medals in a single edition of the Olympics since Independence.She won bronze medals in the 10m air pistol and 10m air pistol mixed team events in Paris, creating history.Manu acknowledges that her success wouldn't have been possible without Rana's guidance and considers him her mentor, despite his new role as the High Performance coach for pistol shooters at the NRAI."Honestly, I only have to say one thing that he (Rana) is my coach all I know and he is very good at what he does. He is very very talented and he has been a great coach for me. All I know and all I can say is that he is my coach. Of course, he can be anyone else's coach as well but for me he is my coach," Manu said on Monday.Manu took a long break to recover from a sore elbow. Upon her return to the competitive circuit at the National trials earlier this month, she finished second behind Rhythm Sangwan but was satisfied with her performance.Looking ahead, Manu plans to participate in World Cups in April and domestic competitions in June, followed by another World Cup in Munich. Her primary target is the World Championships, scheduled for late October or November in Cairo, Egypt, where she aims to peak at the right time.
Article Summary: Double olympic medallist shooter manu bhaker has clarified that jaspal rana will continue to be her coach. Rana was recently appointed as the high performance trainer for the pistol discipline by the national rifle association of india (nrai) rana had a fallout with manu before the tokyo olympics, but they reconciled before the 2024 paris games.

Article Title: “It was ugly”: Connor McDavid expressed disappointment in the final minutes of the game against Finland
Article Text:
Image via Imagn Images

Connor McDavid spoke on Canada’s near collapse against Finland

Canada won 5-3 against Finland, thanks to strong performances from Connor McDavid , Nathan MacKinnon, and Sidney Crosby. Despite a late Finland comeback attempt, Canada held on, with Crosby sealing the win in the final moments. This puts Canada into the 4 Nations Face-Off championship game against the United States on Thursday.Team Canada secured a 5-3 win over Team Finland to advance to the 4 Nations Faceoff final against Team USA. Connor McDavid, who replaced Mitch Marner after mixed results, discussed their near collapse and previewed the next game. McDavid's linemates were changed up after mixed results, but Canada managed to score once again, but almost lost the game.Team Canada needed to win in regulation to earn a rematch against the USA. Initially, it seemed like a sure victory, but Finland's comeback in the third period made the deficit too close for comfort. Connor McDavid expressed disappointment in the final minutes of the game and emphasized the need for Team Canada to improve their closing out skills.McDavid said, "It was ugly. Ugly way to end the game, for sure. Closer than we would've liked, but I thought that for 16-15 minutes there we did a great job just kinda wasting time. But it got close for sure.Starts haven't been the issue for our group, we've been great off the start. But again, we let them back in late. But we found a way to get a win, and that's all that matters. It sets up a great one on Thursday.”Also Read: Team Canada defeated Team Finland at the 4 Nations Face-Off tournament, paving the way for a rematch against Team USA Connor McDavid, the NHL 's top player, has demonstrated exceptional performance in the tournament, scoring two goals in the last two games, and is determined to win for Canada. The highly anticipated hockey game between Canada and the USA on Thursday is expected to be a thrilling match, with the hope that Canada will emerge victorious.
Article Summary: Team canada secured a 5-3 win over team finland to advance to the 4 nations faceoff final against team usa. Connor mcdavid expressed disappointment in the final minutes of the game and emphasized the need for team canada to improve their closing out skills. The highly anticipated hockey game between canada and the usa is expected to be a thrilling match.

Article Title: Liam Lawson braces for "Very, Very Tough" start in Red Bull F1 due to track challenges
Article Text:
Credit: Coates / XPB Images

Liam Lawson Expects a Challenging Red Bull F1 Debut



Liam Lawson on the 2025 F1 Season, Advice For Rookies, & George Russell's Escape Room Skills

Liam Lawson is set to make his highly anticipated full-season debut in Formula 1, stepping into a Red Bull seat alongside Max Verstappen . However, the young Kiwi is under no illusions about the challenges ahead. With only 11 grand prix starts under his belt, all of which came in the latter half of 2023 and 2024, Lawson acknowledges that adapting to the demands of a full F1 calendar will be a daunting task.Liam Lawson was officially named as Sergio Perez’s replacement in December, following a disappointing season for the Mexican driver. Despite Red Bull’s dominant performance last year, the 22-year-old driver is not expecting immediate success, particularly given his lack of experience on several circuits that feature early in the 2025 calendar.The upcoming season will introduce Lawson to a host of unfamiliar tracks, adding an extra layer of difficulty to his transition into one of F1’s most competitive seats. “Going into a year like this, especially the start of the season, I’m going to a lot of tracks I haven’t done before,” he admitted. “I think the start of the year is going to be the hardest as well. Going to a bunch of tracks I haven’t done before starting the season, it’s going to be very, very tough.”While the Red Bull RB21 is expected to be a front-running car, Lawson is not setting unrealistic expectations for himself. His early-season schedule includes challenging circuits like Melbourne, Shanghai, Miami, and Montreal—places he has either never raced on or only experienced in junior categories. Nonetheless, he remains eager to embrace the challenge, stating, “I’m very excited for Melbourne and I’m very excited for the start of the year.”Despite the uphill battle, Lawson is looking forward to proving himself at the highest level. “There’s a lot of cool tracks that I haven’t done that I think I will enjoy, like Melbourne. China looks like a cool track, Canada is somewhere I’ve always wanted to drive.”Also Read: "Anyone who doubts him is silly": Lando Norris slams critics of Lewis Hamilton ahead of Ferrari F1 debut With a new team, heightened expectations, and an uncharted season ahead, Lawson is prepared for what could be his toughest yet most rewarding year in Formula 1.
Article Summary: Liam lawson is set to make his full-season debut for red bull in 2025. The 22-year-old kiwi has only made 11 grand prix starts in his career. He admits that adapting to the demands of a full f1 calendar will be difficult.

Article Title: IPL 2025: How to book IPL 2025 tickets online and offline, full IPL match schedule, and other details
Article Text:
Delhi Capitals (DC): Visakhapatnam & Arun Jaitley Stadium, New Delhi

Visakhapatnam & Arun Jaitley Stadium, New Delhi Rajasthan Royals (RR): Guwahati (two matches against KKR & CSK) & Sawai Mansingh Stadium, Jaipur

Guwahati (two matches against KKR & CSK) & Sawai Mansingh Stadium, Jaipur Punjab Kings (PBKS): New PCA Stadium, New Chandigarh (four matches) & Himachal Pradesh Cricket Association Stadium, Dharamsala (three matches against LSG, DC, and MI)

Qualifier 1 (May 20, 2025) & Eliminator (May 21, 2025): Hyderabad

Qualifier 2 (May 23, 2025): Kolkata

Final (May 25, 2025): Kolkata

Book IPL 2025 tickets online

Steps to book IPL 2025 tickets online

Visit the booking website (e.g., BookMyShow, Paytm, IPLT20.com).

Select the match you want to attend and choose the stadium.

Pick your seating category (General, Mid-Range, Premium, or VIP).

Proceed to checkout and enter payment details.

Complete the payment using a debit/credit card, UPI, or net banking.

Receive a confirmation via email or SMS with booking details.

Book IPL 2025 tickets offline

Stadium box offices

Authorized retail outlets

Steps to buy IPL 2025 tickets offline

Visit the nearest authorised ticket counter at the stadium or designated retail location.

Check ticket availability for the desired match and seating category.

Provide a valid identification document, such as Aadhaar, PAN, or passport.

Choose your seats and proceed with payment (cash, card, or digital wallet).

Collect your ticket after the successful transaction.

The Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI) has officially announced the schedule for the 18th edition of the TATA Indian Premier League (IPL) 2025. The tournament will kick off on March 22, 2025, and conclude with the final on May 25, 2025. A total of 74 matches will be played across 13 venues, including 12 double-headers. Afternoon matches will begin at 3:30 PM IST, while evening matches will start at 7:30 PM IST.The tournament will open with a high-voltage clash between defending champions Kolkata Knight Riders (KKR) and Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) at Eden Gardens, Kolkata, on March 22, 2025.The first double-header day will be on March 23, 2025, with Sunrisers Hyderabad (SRH) facing Rajasthan Royals (RR) in Hyderabad in the afternoon, followed by a blockbuster evening clash between five-time champions Chennai Super Kings (CSK) and Mumbai Indians (MI) at the MA Chidambaram Stadium, Chennai.Delhi Capitals (DC) and Lucknow Super Giants (LSG) will begin their campaigns against each other in Visakhapatnam on March 24, 2025. Meanwhile, the world’s largest cricket stadium, Narendra Modi Stadium in Ahmedabad, will host its first match on March 25, 2025, where Gujarat Titans (GT) will take on Punjab Kings (PBKS).Three IPL teams will play their home matches at two different venues:After the league stage, the IPL 2025 Playoffs will be held in Hyderabad and Kolkata:Online booking is the most convenient way for fans to secure their IPL tickets. Although the Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI) has not yet announced specific booking procedures, previous seasons indicate that tickets will primarily be accessible through online platforms.For those who prefer buying tickets in person, IPL tickets are also available at:
Article Summary: Delhi capitals (dc): visakhapatnam & arun jaitley stadium, new delhi rajasthan royals (rr): guwahati (two matches against kkr & csk) & sawai mansingh stadium, jaipur punjab kings (pbks) qualifier 1 (may 20, 2025) & eliminator (may 21, 2025): hyderabad qualifier 2 (may 23, 2025: kolkata) final (may 25, ipl 2025 schedule: match date, time, venue and venue.

Article Title: Justin Turner: Chicago Cubs secure veteran bat: Justin Turner signs 1-year, $6,000,000 deal
Article Text:
Getty Images

Justin Turner's Contribution to Chicago Cubs: Offering Infield Depth and Veteran Leadership



Cubs Playoff Hopes Powered by Experience



The Chicago Cubs bolstered their roster by signing 40-year-old veteran infielder Justin Turner to a one-year, $6,000,000 contract pending a physical. Turner adds experience, leadership, and offense to a Cubs roster trying to get back to the playoffs for the first time since 2020. With third base and first base played, he adds valuable depth behind Michael Busch and rookie Matt Shaw.The Cubs have officially signed Justin Turner, adding a seasoned veteran to their roster. Turner will be a reserve at first base and add depth at third, where the Cubs intend to begin rookie Matt Shaw. Although Turner saw only six games at third last year, his veteran presence will provide much-needed stability in the infield. His leadership and postseason experience—86 career playoff games—will be an asset for the Cubs' young core.Turner is a prolific hitter well beyond his years. In his previous season, he registered a.354 on-base percentage over 139 contests for the Toronto Blue Jays and Seattle Mariners with 11 home runs and a.259 average. Throughout his 16 seasons of major league service, Turner has held an outstanding.821 OPS, a testament to his power to reach base and plate appearances. Turner's clutchness will provide the depth the Cubs offense seeks to its lineup.Turner's postseason resume is one of the main factors why Chicago signed him. The ex-Los Angeles Dodgers veteran has been involved in several deep playoff series, earning two All-Star nods and placing in the top-15 in MVP voting three times. The Cubs, who have not made the playoffs in four years, are hoping Turner's experience will lead them back into contention.Alongside the Turner signing, the Cubs also inked right-hander Chris Flexen to a minor league deal. Flexen, 30, made 30 starts for the Chicago White Sox last season and could provide additional pitching depth if called up during the season.The signing of Justin Turner represents a strategic adjustment for the Cubs in an attempt to bolster the roster with established leadership and middle-of-the-lineup depth. He is valuable because of his experience, two-way capability, and steady bat. With the spring training taking place, Turner's arrival has the potential to return the Cubs to playoff positioning in 2025.Also Read: Who is Cole Tucker’s wife Vanessa Hudgens? Everything on Angels star’s romance with Hollywood gem
Article Summary: The chicago cubs have signed 40-year-old infielder justin turner to a one-year, $6,000,000 contract pending a physical. Turner adds experience, leadership, and offense to a cubs roster trying to get back to the playoffs for the first time since 2020. The cubs also inked right-hander chris flexen to a minor league deal.

Article Title: "It's business": Vladimir Guerrero Jr. rejects 'very, very aggressive' Blue Jays contract extension
Article Text:
Vladimir Guerrero Jr. rejects 'very, very aggressive' Blue Jays contract extension (Image Source: Vladimir/IG)

Vladimir Guerrero Jr.’s take on rejecting contract extension with Blue Jays

"I am confident that we exhausted the communication, the ideas, the thoughts and communicated every dollar. The offers that we made for Vlad would've been record-setting and would've made him one of the highest-paid players in the game."

"Listen, I want to be here. I want to be a Blue Jay for the rest of my career. But it's free agency. It's business. So I'm going to have to listen to 29 more teams and they're going to have to compete for that."

“The signing of

Anthony Santander

with Toronto today guaranteed Vladimir Guerrero Jr. that the team wants to win and do not be surprised that before Spring Training begins he is signing a contract with the Toronto Blue Jays of over 450 million to 550 million,"

The Toronto Blue Jays have finally decided to bid farewell to their star player Vladimir Guerrero Jr. The Blue Jays have concluded their contract extension negotiations, sending Guerrero Jr. to free agency in November. Guerrero Jr. recently opened up about his reaction to not signing a contract extension, calling his decision a “business” move.On Tuesday, Vladimir Guerrero Jr. revealed that his negotiations for a contract extension with the Toronto Blue Jays have officially concluded. Guerrero Jr. has decided to say "no" to the final offer made by the Blue Jays. According to ESPN, general manager Ross Atkins labeled the team's offer as "very, very aggressive." Sharing his take, Atkins said:As for Vladimir Guerrero Jr. he "wants to be" with the Blue for "the rest of" his career in the league. However, it won't come at the cost of settling for an undervalued contract. Sharing his reaction to rejecting the contract extension offer from the Blue Jays, Guerrero Jr. said:MLB insider Hector Gomez previously revealed Vladimir Guerrero Jr. could possibly sign an extension with the Toronto Blue Jays worth $550 Million. Sharing his take via an X post last month, Gomez wrote (translated from Spanish to English):The Blue Jays fans would definitely be upset with Vladimir Guerrero Jr.'s decision, who previously shared his desperation for wanting him back with the team.
Article Summary: Vladimir guerrero jr. rejects'very, very aggressive' blue jays contract extension. Toronto blue jays general manager ross atkins labeled the team's offer as "very,very aggressive" guerrero jr.: "listen, i want to be a blue jay for the rest of my career"

Article Title: Champions Trophy 2025 All Team Squads: Full Players List and Updates
Article Text:
BCCI Photo

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

How Mohammed Shami’s horoscope foretells India's success in Champions Trophy

INDIA SQUAD:

PAKISTAN SQUAD:

Champions Trophy: Will India and South Africa clash in another ICC final?

AUSTRALIA SQUAD:

TRAVELLING RESERVE:

NEW ZEALAND SQUAD:

BANGLADESH SQUAD:

AFGHANISTAN SQUAD:

ENGLAND SQUAD:

SOUTH AFRICA SQUAD:

TRAVELLING RESERVE:

NEW DELHI: The ICC Champions Trophy is set to begin in Pakistan on February 19, marking its return after an eight-year gap. The marquee tournament will feature the top eight men’s ODI teams competing for the prestigious title. The teams are divided into two groups, with the top two from each group advancing to the semifinals.Group A includes hosts Pakistan, India, New Zealand, and Bangladesh, setting the stage for intense subcontinental clashes. Meanwhile, Group B features Australia, England, South Africa, and Afghanistan.India will kick off their ICC Men's Champions Trophy 2025 campaign against Bangladesh on February 20, followed by a high-stakes encounter against Pakistan on February 23. Their final Group A match will be against New Zealand on March 2.The 15-match tournament will be played over 19 days across Pakistan and the UAE. Under the hybrid model, India will play all their matches in Dubai, including the semifinal and final, should they qualify.Led by Rohit Sharma, India enter the competition with a strong squad, featuring eight players from their victorious T20 World Cup 2024 campaign.However, the team has suffered a setback with pace spearhead Jasprit Bumrah ruled out due to injury. Young pacer Harshit Rana has been named as his replacement, while Varun Chakaravarthy comes in for Yashasvi Jaiswal.Rohit Sharma (c), Shubman Gill, Virat Kohli, Shreyas Iyer, KL Rahul, Rishabh Pant, Hardik Pandya, Axar Patel, Washington Sundar, Kuldeep Yadav, Harshit Rana, Mohd. Shami, Arshdeep Singh, Ravindra Jadeja, Varun Chakaravarthy.Defending champions Pakistan, led by wicketkeeper-batter Mohammad Rizwan, will look to defend their 2017 title. The squad includes key players from their previous Champions Trophy-winning campaign, such as Fakhar Zaman, Babar Azam, and Faheem Ashraf. However, they will be without opener Saim Ayub, who has been ruled out due to injury.Mohammad Rizwan (c), Babar Azam, Fakhar Zaman, Kamran Ghulam, Saud Shakeel, Tayyab Tahir, Faheem Ashraf, Khushdil Shah, Salman Ali Agha, Usman Khan, Abrar Ahmed, Haris Rauf, Mohammad Hasnain, Naseem Shah, Shaheen Shah Afridi.ODI world champions Australia will enter the tournament with a depleted squad, as several senior players have withdrawn. Captain Pat Cummins, along with key pacers Josh Hazlewood and Mitchell Starc, have pulled out, leading to Steve Smith taking over the captaincy.Additionally, the Aussies will be without all-rounder Mitchell Marsh. In their absence, newcomers Ben Dwarshuis, Spencer Johnson, and Tanveer Sangha have been called up to bolster the squad.Steve Smith (c), Sean Abbott, Alex Carey, Ben Dwarshuis, Nathan Ellis, Jake Fraser-McGurk, Aaron Hardie, Travis Head, Josh Inglis, Spencer Johnson, Marnus Labuschagne, Glenn Maxwell, Tanveer Sangha, Matthew Short, Adam Zampa.Cooper Connolly.New Zealand’s squad saw late changes with pacers Ben Sears and Lockie Ferguson ruled out with injuries. Sears was first forced out due to a hamstring injury, with Jacob Duffy named as his replacement. On the eve of the tournament opener, Ferguson joined the sidelines with a right foot injury. Kyle Jamieson came in as the replacement.Mitchell Santner, captaining the Kiwis in his first ICC tournament, will lead a squad that blends youth and experience.With veteran pacers Trent Boult, Tim Southee and Ferguson unavailable, the onus will be on Matt Henry, Kyle Jamieson and young quick Nathan Smith to step up.Mitchell Santner (c), Michael Bracewell, Mark Chapman, Devon Conway, Kyle Jamieson, Matt Henry, Tom Latham, Daryl Mitchell, Will O’Rourke, Glenn Phillips, Rachin Ravindra, Jacob Duffy, Nathan Smith, Kane Williamson, Will Young.Meanwhile, Bangladesh, under the leadership of Najmul Hossain Shanto, will look to improve on their semi-final finish from 2017.Veteran campaigners Mahmudullah and Mushfiqur Rahim bring experience and stability, while promising youngsters Nahid Rana and Rishad Hossain add dynamism to the squad.Nazmul Hossain Shanto (c), Soumya Sarkar, Tanzid Hasan, Tawhid Hridoy, Mushfiqur Rahim, MD Mahmud Ullah, Jaker Ali Anik, Mehidy Hasan Miraz, Rishad Hossain, Taskin Ahmed, Mustafizur Rahman, Parvez Hossai Emon, Nasum Ahmed, Tanzim Hasan Sakib, Nahid Rana.Afghanistan made a late change to their squad, with young spinner Nangyal Kharoti replacing the injured Allah Ghazanfar.The team retains experienced stars Rashid Khan and Mohammad Nabi, while Rahmanullah Gurbaz and Ibrahim Zadran bolster the top order.Hashmatullah Shahidi (c), Ibrahim Zadran, Rahmanullah Gurbaz, Sediqullah Atal, Rahmat Shah, Ikram Alikhil, Gulbadin Naib, Azmatullah Omarzai, Mohammad Nabi, Rashid Khan, Nangyal Kharoti, Noor Ahmad, Fazalhaq Farooqi, Farid Malik, Naveed Zadran. Reserves: Darwish Rasooli, Bilal SamiEngland’s squad features the return of Joe Root, while Tom Banton comes in as a replacement for the injured Jacob Bethell.Led by Jos Buttler, their pace attack will be spearheaded by Jofra Archer and Mark Wood, with Gus Atkinson and Jamie Overton providing support.The ECB statement read, "Scans on a left groin injury have confirmed that England Men's batter Ben Duckett is fit and available for the ICC Champions Trophy. Duckett sustained the injury while fielding during the first innings of England's third ODI defeat to India in Ahmedabad last Wednesday."Jos Buttler (c), Jofra Archer, Gus Atkinson, Jacob Bethell, Harry Brook, Brydon Carse, Ben Duckett, Jamie Overton, Jamie Smith, Liam Livingstone, Adil Rashid, Joe Root, Saqib Mahmood, Phil Salt, Mark WoodSouth Africa suffered a setback with Anrich Nortje ruled out due to injury, prompting the inclusion of Corbin Bosch.Kagiso Rabada spearheads the Proteas' pace attack, while Temba Bavuma, Aiden Markram, Rassie van der Dussen, and Heinrich Klaasen form the backbone of their batting lineup.Temba Bavuma (c), Tony de Zorzi, Marco Jansen, Heinrich Klaasen, Keshav Maharaj, Aiden Markram, David Miller, Wiaan Mulder, Lungi Ngidi, Kagiso Rabada, Ryan Rickelton, Tabraiz Shamsi, Tristan Stubbs, Rassie van der Dussen, Corbin Bosch.Kwena Maphaka
Article Summary: Icc champions trophy begins in pakistan on february 19. Top eight men's odi teams will compete for the prestigious title. Group a includes hosts pakistan, india, new zealand, and bangladesh. Group b features australia, england, south africa, and afghanistan. Mitchell santner captaining the kiwis in his first icc tournament.

Article Title: “Old fool”: Deion Sanders refused to be swayed by Patrick Mahomes' hype, remains a strong supporter of Tom Brady as the GOAT
Article Text:
Image via Imagn Images

Deion Sanders chooses Tom Brady in the GOAT debate against Patrick Mahomes

Deion Sanders , known for his life and personality, recently visited New Orleans and met Kayla Nicole, Travis Kelce 's ex-girlfriend, representing I Am Athlete. During a conversation, she asked Prime a question about Tom Brady or Patrick Mahomes , which stood out among the other questions she asked.Chiefs quarterback Mahomes is on the verge of becoming the GOAT, a feat no other quarterback has achieved, including Brady. Analysts like Stephen A. Smith believe Mahomes has solidified his place in the conversation. However, Deion Mahomes, an "old-school" man, remains a strong supporter of Brady as the greatest of all time.Deion Sanders, a former Buffaloes coach and NFL Hall of Famer, refused to be swayed by Patrick Mahomes' hype at the 2025 NFL Honors gala, instead choosing Tom Brady in the GOAT debate. "I'm going with Brady," Sanders declared confidently. "I'm old school. Not old fool."Despite concerns, Mahomes remains a champion with a record of seven Super Bowl titles, five Super Bowl MVPs, and three league MVPs. His longevity, dominance, and rings continue to reign supreme. Mahomes, a three-time Super Bowl winner and MVP, is being hailed as Brady's successor.However, Sanders has been lukewarm on Mahomes. When celebrating Kansas City's AFC Championship win, Sanders praised Travis Kelce, head coach Andy Reid, and even wide receiver DeAndre Hopkins-but left out the Chiefs' QB."I got mad love for my brother, Travis Kelce, and I'm proud of all that he's accomplished," Sanders tweeted. "And I'm so darn happy for one of our game's greatest receivers, DeAndre Hopkins, Coach Reid & the Chiefs. Wow, God is good.”Kayla Nicole inquired about Prime's stance on the Kendrick vs Drake controversy, and he provided a detailed response. “Come on man you know I’m a Drake guy. I’m Weezy, I’m Mack Maine. You know I’m on that side.”Deion Sanders revealed a bias towards rappers, but did not confirm if he had spoken with Drake after the beef erupted. Prime admitted, “I haven’t spoken to him about this. I love them both but it shouldn’t be all this foolishness. I don’t like all this. Can we all just get along? Can we love one another? Like unity, you and I. I don’t like that. Come on this is entertainment… I don’t like to see brothers going at it.”Also Read: “Never gets a flag”: Fans call out Travis Kelce for getting away with taunting against the Philadelphia Eagles Deion Sanders is reportedly downplaying the contributions of quarterback Mahomes, despite his significant role in the Chiefs' victory over Buffalo. Mahomes may challenge Brady's legacy, but Sanders is not yet there, and the GOAT debate is intensifying as Sanders doubles down on his pick.
Article Summary: Deion sanders met travis kelce's ex-girlfriend kayla nicole in new orleans. She asked him about tom brady or patrick mahomes as the goat. Sanders said he was going with brady because he is "old school" sanders also revealed his bias towards rappers drake and kendrick lamar.

NEW DELHI: The Board of Control for Cricket in India on Sunday unveiled a 74-match schedule for the 18th Indian Premier League that will be held across 13 venues, starting on March 22 with the blockbuster clash between defending champions Kolkata Knight Riders and Royal Challengers Bengaluru at Eden Gardens.This year, the iconic Eden Gardens will also host the final on May 25.The schedule, featuring 12 double-headers will see games being held over 65 days across 13 venues, with Dharamsala, Guwahati, and Visakhapatnam hosting a couple of IPL fixtures each.Dharamsala will serve as Punjab Kings' second home venue alongside Mullanpur (New Chandigarh), while Rajasthan Royals will make Guwahati their base in addition to Jaipur.Delhi Capitals will have Visakhapatnam as their second home venue and will start their league campaign there on March 24 against Lucknow Super Giants.The playoffs will be staged in Hyderabad and Kolkata after the league stage.Hyderabad will host Qualifier 1 and the Eliminator on May 20 and May 21, respectively, with the action shifting to Kolkata for Qualifier 2 on May 23.The IPL will continue with its two-group structure after the 2022 expansion to a 10-team format.Kolkata Knight Riders, Royal Challengers Bangalore, Rajasthan Royals, Chennai Super Kings, and Punjab Kings are in one group, while Sunrisers Hyderabad, Delhi Capitals, Gujarat Titans, Mumbai Indians, and Lucknow Super Giants are in the other.
